data.name: Super Magbot: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Super Magbot Original Soundtrack includes 52 16-bit tracks created in Analogue Mega SG, a modern recreation of the Mega Drive with higher fidelity of sound but the same chip architecture and technical constraints as the classic console.

Experience over two hours of upbeat, modern chiptune music that pushes the 16-bit hardware to its limits. The Super Magbot Original Soundtrack was created by Moonsailor, an award-winning studio of music and audio for games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 307 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
